name: GeoNetwork Data Catalog at gdi-he.gingko.de
description: GeoNetwork is a catalog application to manage spatially referenced resources, providing powerful metadata editing and search functions as well as an interactive web map viewer. It supports standards for geospatial data and integrates with OGC services (WMS, WMTS, KML, OWS), allowing for publication and management of metadata using international standards such as ISO19115/119/110 and Dublin Core. The catalog supports multilingual metadata editing, validation, and quality improvement, and is part of the OSGeo software stack.
owner_name: Not directly specified in the URL
